verses.verse: תְּ֭פִלָּה <S%H8605><s%> A Prayer לְעָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> of the afflicted כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַעֲטֹ֑ף <S%H5848><s%> when he is overwhelmed וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <S%H8210><s%> and poureth out שִׂיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7879><s%> his complaint יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD שִׁמְעָ֣ה <S%H8085><s%> Hear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> my prayer וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י <S%H7775><s%> and let my cry אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> about תָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> come

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּסְתֵּ֬ר <S%H5641><s%> Hide פָּנֶ֨יךָ ׀ <S%H6440><s%> not thy face מִמֶּנִּי֮ <S%H4480><s%> in בְּי֪וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from me in the day צַ֫ר <S%H6862><s%> [when] I am in trouble לִ֥י הַטֵּֽה־ <S%H5186><s%> incline אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> about אָזְנֶ֑ךָ <S%H241><s%> thine ear בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto me in the day אֶ֝קְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> [when] I call מַהֵ֥ר <S%H4118><s%> me speedily עֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> answer

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָל֣וּ <S%H3615><s%> are consumed בְעָשָׁ֣ן <S%H6227><s%> like smoke יָמָ֑י <S%H3117><s%> For my days וְ֝עַצְמוֹתַ֗י <S%H6106><s%> and my bones כְּמוֹ־ <S%H4168><s%> as an hearth קֵ֥ד <S%H4168><s%> A hearth נִחָֽרוּ׃ <S%H2787><s%> are burned

הוּכָּֽה־ <S%H5221><s%> is smitten כָ֭עֵשֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> like grass וַיִּבַ֣שׁ <S%H3001><s%> and withered לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> My heart כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed שָׁ֝כַ֗חְתִּי <S%H7911><s%> so that I forget מֵאֲכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> to eat לַחְמִֽי׃ <S%H3899><s%> my bread
מִקּ֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> By reason of the voice אַנְחָתִ֑י <S%H585><s%> of my groaning דָּבְקָ֥ה <S%H1692><s%> cleave עַ֝צְמִ֗י <S%H6106><s%> my bones לִבְשָׂרִֽי׃ <S%H1320><s%> to my skin

דָּ֭מִיתִי <S%H1819><s%> I am like לִקְאַ֣ת <S%H6893><s%> a pelican מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become כְּכ֣וֹס <S%H3563><s%> I am like an owl חֳרָבֽוֹת׃ <S%H2723><s%> of the desert

שָׁקַ֥דְתִּי <S%H8245><s%> I watch וָאֶֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> have become כְּ֝צִפּ֗וֹר <S%H6833><s%> and am as a sparrow בּוֹדֵ֥ד <S%H909><s%> alone עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on גָּֽג׃ <S%H1406><s%> upon the house top

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> me all the day חֵרְפ֣וּנִי <S%H2778><s%> reproach אוֹיְבָ֑י <S%H341><s%> Mine enemies מְ֝הוֹלָלַ֗י <S%H1984><s%> [and] they that are mad בִּ֣י נִשְׁבָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H7650><s%> against me are sworn

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֭פֶר <S%H665><s%> ashes כַּלֶּ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> like bread אָכָ֑לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> For I have eaten וְ֝שִׁקֻּוַ֗י <S%H8249><s%> my drink בִּבְכִ֥י <S%H1065><s%> with weeping מָסָֽכְתִּי׃ <S%H4537><s%> and mingled

מִפְּנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> Because זַֽעַמְךָ֥ <S%H2195><s%> of thine indignation וְקִצְפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7110><s%> and thy wrath כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נְ֝שָׂאתַ֗נִי <S%H5375><s%> for thou hast lifted me up וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7993><s%> and cast me down

יָ֭מַי <S%H3117><s%> My days כְּצֵ֣ל <S%H6738><s%> [are] like a shadow נָט֑וּי <S%H5186><s%> that declineth וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I כָּעֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> like grass אִיבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> and I am withered

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> But thou O LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever תֵּשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> shalt endure וְ֝זִכְרְךָ֗ <S%H2143><s%> and thy remembrance לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> unto all וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You תָ֭קוּם <S%H6965><s%> Thou shalt arise תְּרַחֵ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> [and] have mercy צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> upon Zion כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> for the time לְ֝חֶֽנְנָ֗הּ <S%H2603><s%> to favour כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> is come מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> her yea the set time

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely רָצ֣וּ <S%H7521><s%> take pleasure עֲ֭בָדֶיךָ <S%H5650><s%> For thy servants אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבָנֶ֑יהָ <S%H68><s%> in her stones וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲפָרָ֥הּ <S%H6083><s%> the dust יְחֹנֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H2603><s%> and favour

וְיִֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> shall fear ג֭וֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> So the heathen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> and all the kings הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> thy glory

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָנָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> shall build up יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> When the LORD צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion נִ֝רְאָ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> he shall appear בִּכְבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> in his glory

פָּ֭נָה <S%H6437><s%> He will regard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תְּפִלַּ֣ת <S%H8605><s%> the prayer הָעַרְעָ֑ר <S%H6199><s%> of the destitute וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not בָ֝זָ֗ה <S%H959><s%> and not despise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּפִלָּתָֽם׃ <S%H8605><s%> their prayer

תִּכָּ֣תֶב <S%H3789><s%> This shall be written זֹ֭את <S%H2063><s%> for לְד֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> for the generation אַחֲר֑וֹן <S%H314><s%> to come וְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people נִ֝בְרָ֗א <S%H1254><s%> which shall be created יְהַלֶּל־ <S%H1984><s%> shall praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> the LORD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִ֭שְׁקִיף <S%H8259><s%> For he hath looked down מִמְּר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> from the height קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> of his sanctuary יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> did the LORD מִשָּׁמַ֤יִם ׀ <S%H8064><s%> from heaven אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon אֶ֬רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth הִבִּֽיט׃ <S%H5027><s%> behold

לִ֭שְׁמֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> To hear אֶנְקַ֣ת <S%H603><s%> the groaning אָסִ֑יר <S%H615><s%> of the prisoner לְ֝פַתֵּ֗חַ <S%H6605><s%> to loose בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> those that are appointed תְמוּתָֽה׃ <S%H8546><s%> to death

לְסַפֵּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> To declare בְּ֭צִיּוֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּ֝תְהִלָּת֗וֹ <S%H8416><s%> and his praise בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

בְּהִקָּבֵ֣ץ <S%H6908><s%> are gathered עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> When the people יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together וּ֝מַמְלָכ֗וֹת <S%H4467><s%> and the kingdoms לַעֲבֹ֥ד <S%H5647><s%> to serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
עִנָּ֖ה <S%H6031><s%> He weakened בַדֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way [כֹּחֹו כ] (כֹּחִ֗י <S%H3581><s%> ability ק) קִצַּ֥ר <S%H7114><s%> he shortened יָמָֽי׃ <S%H3117><s%> my days

אֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> I said אֵלִ֗י <S%H410><s%> O my God אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּ֭עֲלֵנִי <S%H5927><s%> take me not away בַּחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> in the midst יָמָ֑י <S%H3117><s%> of my days בְּד֖וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [are] throughout all דּוֹרִ֣ים <S%H1755><s%> generations שְׁנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8141><s%> thy years

לְ֭פָנִים <S%H6440><s%> Of old הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יָסַ֑דְתָּ <S%H3245><s%> hast thou laid the foundation וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> [are] the work יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thy hands שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> and the heavens

הֵ֤מָּה ׀ <S%H1992><s%> they יֹאבֵדוּ֮ <S%H6><s%> They shall perish וְאַתָּ֪ה <S%H859><s%> You תַ֫עֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> but thou shalt endure וְ֭כֻלָּם <S%H3605><s%> and all כַּבֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> like a garment יִבְל֑וּ <S%H1086><s%> yea all of them shall wax old כַּלְּב֖וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> as a vesture תַּחֲלִיפֵ֣ם <S%H2498><s%> shalt thou change וְֽיַחֲלֹֽפוּ׃ <S%H2498><s%> them and they shall be changed
וְאַתָּה־ <S%H859><s%> You ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> are the same וּ֝שְׁנוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H8141><s%> But thou [art] the same and thy years לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִתָּֽמּוּ׃ <S%H8552><s%> shall have no end

בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> The children עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servants יִשְׁכּ֑וֹנוּ <S%H7931><s%> shall continue וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם <S%H2233><s%> and their seed לְפָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before יִכּֽוֹן׃ <S%H3559><s%> shall be established
